overview: The late Porn Star Trinity Loren was not your average, everyday, run-of-the-mill porn starlet. She staked her claim on 1980's stardom as one of the first true video vixens. Her initial claim to fame was her enormous chest, twin mammarial wonders that reportedly weighed upwards of seven pounds. Once you got past the bra-busting boobs, though, Trinity Loren was a truly unique sexual performer.  Trinity Loren is here and she wants you to fill her up with all you can give her. Her sole desire is sexual satisfaction and she begs for it with an erotic intensity none can match.
title: Deep Inside Trinity Loren
